competitors.notes: Major EDI with hybrid cloud/on-premise offerings

context: By 2015, SPS Commerce's first-mover advantage in cloud EDI had eroded. Revenue grew from $45M (2010) to $159M (2015) at 29% CAGR, but margins cut in half due to competitive pressure. Economic earnings declined from $2M to -$4M.
